elements.label: Workspace
elements.helpText:
The selected folder is used as the workspace where all intermediate and output files will be written.

If the selected folder does not exist, it will be created.

If datasets already exist in the selected folder, they will be overwritten.

elements.label: init.json
elements.helpText: The initial tool configuration file (init.json) from the initial run's results.

elements.label: Data Directory
elements.helpText: A directory that contains all the new data for the scenario to be included in the model run.

elements.label: Comments
elements.helpText: Any comments to be included as part of the model run.
